channel.title: Merc player auto-covert to unseen
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Merc in the day and becomes assassin automatically without being converted, after the last unseen player was voted dead
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
I am supposed to remain as Merc and commit suicide that night
#### Steps to reproduce:
-I am the only merc player.
-First target voted up, but pardoned
-I used my revenge ability when my first target was hanged
-offer my contract to 2nd target, an alchemist
-2nd target got killed by prince in the night
-In the daytime, the last unseen player (MM) was voted up and exed.
-my identity becomes assassin, without being converted (or at least not shown on my end)
